title: David Lammy – 2022 Dr. Jean Mayer Global Citizenship Award Address
author: admin
summary: The speech made by David Lammy, the Shadow Foreign Secretary, in the United States on 31 March 2022.
content:
Thank you to the institute for Global Leadership and The Fletcher School at Tufts University for hosting me to speak about foreign policy at this extremely important moment.
